body: @ezyang I wonder if there's any way to get it done with some modification to NVCC, since the [document](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-compiler-driver-nvcc/index.html#code-changes-for-separate-compilation) only mentions that it can be controlled by using `static/extern` . However, [this post](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13029038/hiding-functions-in-static-library) mentioned a rather ugly method, that is to wrap them in a header file and mark them as static.
